t: Men's USA made outerwear, varsity, leather & wool jackets. Est. 1922 – Golden Bear Sportswear
s: Golden Bear began making hard-wearing coats for San Francisco longshoremen in 1922. The brand has been a fixture in the City by the Bay ever since, trusted for its outerwear range that now includes bomber, biker and varsity-style jackets.

The Golden Bear was founded in November 2014 selling leather gloves and jackets online. The business soon developed, and we started working closely with a key supplier. As the business relationship strengthened, we added more of the supplier’s goods to the inventory and eventually decided to push the business in to the EU as part of our expansion.
